{/* Hero Section */}

Nurture Your Mind with MindBloom

Track moods, journal thoughts, and find calm through meditation.

Log Your Mood Write in Journal Explore Meditations
{/* About Section */}

Our Mission

MindBloom empowers female engineering students to prioritize mental wellness with intuitive tools for mindfulness, reflection, and stress relief.

{/* Stats Section */}

Moods Logged

Explore MindBloom

Mood Tracker

Log daily moods and visualize trends to understand your emotional well-being.

Journaling

Write thoughts with inspiring prompts, saved securely in your browser.

Meditations

Explore guided meditation scripts to find calm and focus.

{/* Testimonials Section */}

What Users Say

“MindBloom helps me stay grounded during exams. The mood tracker is a game-changer!”

— Priya, Computer Science Student

“Journaling with MindBloom’s prompts has become my daily ritual. It’s so calming.”

— Anika, Engineering Major

“The meditations are perfect for quick breaks between study sessions.”

— Rhea, Tech Enthusiast
